extendedInfo.description: CM9/CM10, AOKP, BAMF THEMEPLEASE READ THE INSTRUCTIONS BEFORE LEAVING REVIEWS.THIS THEME IS FOR HDPI AND XHDPI PHONES ONLY.ROOT needed and a custom ROM like CM9/AOKP needed that supports the Theme Engine.INSTRUCTIONS:Download the theme, go to settings/themes and APPLY THE SYSTEM THEME AND REBOOT. Now select my Theme & apply. You may get an error: 'Sorry, this theme is missing assets for your device's screen size'.Ignore that and apply it anyway and REBOOT.The lock screen and some system dialogs cannot be themed in the T-Mobile Theme Engine, therefore they will remain unchanged.If you get an Error Message stating that the theme was "Improperly Compiled..." just apply the "system" theme, and reboot your phone. Once your device boots back up go back into the Theme Chooser and apply Royal Blue Cobalt.Royal Blue Cobalt is Primarily a Blue theme that is vastly different than stock ICSThanks to:MrDSL for Code, TONS of Help, and Teaching me to ThemeMrDSL for Inverted Market/Google Now/G-Mail CodeLawsonmh15 for a handful of images

reviews.title: Great job Dustin
reviews.comment: Always been a great contributor to the community. Keep up the great work bud  reverepats!

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Awesome theme.  Not a fan of the small icons in the taskbar but great theme nevertheless.

reviews.title: Galaxy Nexus CM10.1
reviews.comment: Hands down, the best themer out there.  Use plenty of other themes, but always seem to find myself using DustinB\'s work.

reviews.title: Beautiful theme
reviews.comment: A blue theme that actually themes the whole ui. Developer is quick to respond to Google\'s recent updates. Google botches it, this guy fixes it. I love it

reviews.title: Thanks love it
reviews.comment: Hey been using your themes for quite some time an love it easy on the eyes and save me a lot of work doin myself like I used to do lol with that being said do you think you could theme YouTube, pintrest,Google music and Iheart radio  that would be awesome they seem left out and out casted from all the rest of the purty blue icons

reviews.title: awesome theme
reviews.comment: contacted author about getting it to work on my tab. he had an answer and sure enuff worked like a charm. love the dark blue and definately like the play store makeover. i\'m sure a ton of work went into this and i am definately pleased with it.

reviews.title: Top Shelf Theme
reviews.comment: Many, many elements are themed.  The black backgrounds really make the royal blue trim and detailing pop.  Inverted play store -  thats always a must for me.  I\'m not fully satisfied with themes very often but this one hits the spot.
